posts.message:
Anyone interested in a Linux project ?

UPDATE 

Since there are a lot of different Linux distros e.g.( Ubuntu studio - Kali , etc )
i was thinking about ' building ' a Linux distro as well
it'll be a basic build as a start then we'll develop it in different possible ways
finally we'll ' create ' a brand new distro 

if anyone is interested , just PM me or Comment 
who are u  , what u do , why u are interested and how can u participate .

* The project will be Open Source for sure .
